title: 2016 is the Year of VR; but is VR ready?
text:
2016 is the Year of VR; but is VR ready? 
Published By: Gamesindustry.biz - Today 
High prices and scant software will restrict VR to a narrow group of enthusiasts; a wider view of VR's potential could open up the tech to t...
